backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, active users, and access‑controlled admin operations with ordered-map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented caching normalization and invalidation features with linked files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing routing, hooks, components, styling, and behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, root layout with conditional header/footer, 404 handling, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting file uploads, Giphy search/trending GIF selection, and avatar update/removal.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat area handling message loading, auto‑scrolling, sending, replies, pinned video, and expandable header layout.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom preview card with dynamic thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter and fetches related preview data.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating new chatrooms with inputs for text, categories, media uploads, and YouTube/Twitch/Twitter links.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection features.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component since authentication is intentionally unused.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders chat messages with reactions, media previews, timestamps, and optional reply or pin interactions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides the text input, media upload, and recording interface for sending messages.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in a chatroom with an option to unpin.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with play/pause, waveform visualization, progress tracking, and metadata loading/reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Triggers a one-time fresh chatroom fetch when the actor becomes ready, updating cache with sorted results.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, user metadata, and actions, with local storage helpers and edge-case guards.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, mobile input fixes, and custom styling for the voice message range slider.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports Giphy API key and result limit constants.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility to format numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Functions for searching and fetching trending GIFs from Giphy, returning normalized results with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress callbacks, returning the smaller of original or compressed file.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to create a lightweight preview with caching and deduplicated requests.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage-based caching for Twitter preview objects with validation, versioning, and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter thumbnail logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter thumbnail caching.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating corresponding thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page requiring a password to view and delete chatrooms, using React state, hooks, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments view count once, handles loading and error states, and renders ChatArea when ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: React lobby page that fetches and displays chatrooms with search, category filters, debouncing, and navigation, handling loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing React Query cache normalization requirements, known issues with empty-filter cache keys, and pending feature requests.
